entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as a person who can be seen from the upstairs windows, defrosting broomsticks on the Quidditch pitch. He is bundled up in a long mole-skin overcoat, rabbit-fur gloves and enormous beaverskin boots.

entities.name: quidditch
entities.description: Quidditch is described as the sport being played on the pitch. The Quidditch season has begun, and Harry will be playing in his first match after weeks of training.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is described as a house that is competing in the House Championship. If they win, they will move up into second place.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is described as a house that is competing against Gryffindor in the House Championship.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as a person who will be playing Seeker in his first match. He has been kept secret by Wood, but the news of his playing has leaked out.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is described as a person who has decided to keep Harry's playing a secret. He considers Harry their secret weapon.

relationships.description: Hagrid is associated with Quidditch as he can be seen defrosting broomsticks on the Quidditch pitch.
Harry is a member of Gryffindor house and will be playing in their match against Slytherin.
Harry plays Quidditch as he is going to play in his first match after weeks of training.
Gryffindor competes against Slytherin in the House Championship. If they win, they will move up into second place.
Wood keeps Harry's playing a secret as he considers him their secret weapon.
